amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to allow (but does not mandate) the Pacific OCS planning area to be included in a future five-year leasing plan under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McClintock.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
